commit message:
Navigate to existing instance of MainActivity from notifications

When tapping on the status notification, don't create a new instance of
MainActivity but rather switch to the existing activity, clearing the
navigation stack if needed.
Bring Settings menu item to action bar
Change actionbar color in recent apps list to light gray
Fix wierd side margins in SettingsActivity in landscape mode
Don't show root warning after first launch

Replace Switch with a ToggleButton

This makes it look less like the settings screen to eliminate possible
confusion. Plus, it looked kind of ugly - a bigToggleButton seems much
better.
